name: Dice Duel (ArkarPhyo, MinKhant)
description:
A game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 "Roll of the Dice". 🎲

Destroy the enemy base before they destroy yours. Roll the dice and let your fate decide how many bullets your cannon will shoot.

Gameplay

Your cannon is automatically rotating in a pattern. Every time you roll the dice and get  a number, your cannon will shoot the same amount of bullet you got from rolling the dice.

The power-up circles will sometimes appear on the board. If your dice lands on those circles, you'll get that power-up and will be used in following shot.

Enemy is also rolling the dice and shooting at your base. You have to destroy the enemy base before they can destroy you.

Controls

Click or touch on the board to throw the dice.

3D Artist - Arkar Phyo
